channel.title: Different client for a base
channel.description:
Hi I am using 317[PI] base, I have added random stuff on to it, now I hate the client :( it looks old, I would like it to be 614+. The problem is in 317 client [maparea] and [invarea] are located under spirits. In the 614 client(s) that I have downloaded has auto-cache downlader and not the spirit folder. Can anyone gimmick the pictures of it?
Thank in advance. Shawn
Edit : I have never worked with 508+ server.

item.title: Different client for a base
